column4: Is there a way to increase the area in which you can grab a window to stretch it? It is currently a single pixel wide which is a pain to try and grab.
alt+middle_mouse_button and click drag anywhere in window

I was about to say "that only stretches the bottom part, and its not anywhere, it only works when close to the bottom" when I realized that "hmm, only close to the bottom... maybe the side will make that side move: lo and behold, it does. Thanks mate.
where you trying to get Q3 sound working?
Not that I know of. I'm having input and output issues with TeamSpeak3. I don't know what Q3 is.
i just saw people talking about ioquake and using the quake3 sound fix.  if you're aren't talking about Quake3 (Q3) then nevermind ;)
i don't think "compiz --replace" will work from a tty (i could be wrong)
64bit can be more difficult to configure/setup (i use it)
but other than that, not really a difference?
other then the whole - different architectures ;)
think of nice as "run priority" - see "man nice" for the man page ;)  "man renice" might be of interest as well.
or put it in double quotes

actually the best option is use the TAB key to complete the name
